"use client" import { useState } from "react" import { useNavigate, Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useAuth } from "../contexts/AuthContext" function Login() { const [email, setEmail] = useState("") const [password, setPassword] = useState("") const [error, setError] = useState("") const { login } = useAuth() const navigate = useNavigate() const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setError("") const success = login(email, password) if (success) { navigate("/") } else { setError("Failed to log in. Please check your credentials.") } } return (
